content.rendered:
Date: Saturday 10 September 2022
Location: London
Registration fee: £89
Sponsorship target: £450

Join us for this 26 or 13 mile route through our capital city, taking in sights you know well and others you might not know so well. Either way, it’s a fun and different way to explore London.

Along the way you’ll spot Hope and Homes for Children staff cheering you on, and afterwards we’d love for you to join us to celebrate your epic feat of endurance.

By taking part in this challenge you’ll be directing supporting our work to keep families together, and to close orphanages around the world. And right now, as the invasion of Ukraine continues, your fundraising efforts will enable us to continue our emergency response.

Right now we need your support more than ever, so join us as we walk together to keep families together.

Sign up to the London Adventure Walk marathon challenge

Sign up to the London Adventure Walk half marathon challenge

 

.

excerpt.rendered: Join us for the London Adventure Walk, a fun and different way of exploring our capital city.
